recommendations: Need 1560 redteam items per group to detect 5.0% ASR improvement with 80% power
Need 984 benign items per group to detect 5.0% FPR improvement with 80% power

asr_analysis.interpretation: Need 1560 redteam items per group to detect 5.0% ASR improvement with 80% power

fpr_analysis.interpretation: Need 984 benign items per group to detect 5.0% FPR improvement with 80% power

general_recommendations: Use power analysis to determine sample size BEFORE running experiments
Smoke tests (10-50 items) are insufficient for performance metric estimation
For reliable detection of 5% improvements, typically need 300-400 items per group
Define success metrics and required effect sizes before data collection
Use full, representative datasets for all performance claims
